entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
